items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. items.content_html: A robust, versatile file and folder manager for Node.js, the FileManager class offers essential functions for creating, deleting, reading, writing, and managing files and directories. Lightweight and easy to integrate, its ideal for developers seeking powerful file system management.
